  • Method Details

    • billChocAn

      public static void billChocAn()
      This is the method for when the provider wants to bill ChocAn. It prompts the provider for all of the relevant info, does all of the verification steps, etc.

    • verifyMember

      public static boolean verifyMember(String testID)
      This method is for member verification. You provide a member ID, and this checks it against the list of members to make sure that the member exists.

      this builds a file with the service directory.
